job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Selby Jennings is working with a Dallas based investment manager on an incredibly exciting opportunity. They are looking to bring on ML/Data Engineers with a focus on Natural Language Processing and building ML algorithms.</p><p><br></p><p>You'd be one of the first hires in their Data Innovation and Insights team giving you the opportunity to take ownership and make a tangible impact on the firm. Further details to come upon your application.</p><p><br></p><p>What you have:</p><ul><li>1-5 years of experience</li><li>Strong programming experience in Python </li><li>Extensive experience in Natural Language Processing</li><li>Knowledge of regressions, classification algorithms, decision trees, random forests, and neural networks</li><li>Data scrubbing/cleaning experience</li><li>Knowledge of data streaming, Tensorflow, Spark, Kafka, and AWS are nice to have</li></ul>
